author: Sheena McGinley
title: Gossip | Pics: Rachel Bilson talks maternity bras on the red carpet...
text:
See, you wouldn't even know she had a maternity bra on her, such is the cut of the dress. We're not sure how easily she can unleash herself from said dress, but at least it's keeping the necessary undergarments under wraps. Or we could always take a leaf out of Jessica Biel's book and get a jazzy number worth putting on display.
Mum, Rachel Bilson, made her second red carpet appearance since the birth of her baby girl - Briar Rose Christensen - on October 29th last year . Speaking at the No Kid Hungry Benefit Dinner yesterday in LA's Four Seasons Hotel, she said: "I needed to wear a dress that I could wear a nursing bra with - all [of my] clothes need to be able to [accommodate] a nursing bra," the Hart of Dixie alum, 34, told Us. "Plus, [I love] the colors. I was so happy to wear Jonathan Saunders. I've never worn him before, so I'm excited to be wearing it!"
According to reports, the pumps are by Paul Andrew. As you can see, The Dude was also in attendance, but there are no posts informing us who he was wearing.
